Details

Space Overlay Abandon Finisher - this is an internal object that we create in SpaceOverlay.abandonContents(). Its purpose is to receive an afterAction notification and clean up the report order if necessary. `class `**`SpaceOverlayAbandonFinisher`**` :   object`
